scripts.dev: pnpm run link-posthog-js && pnpm run clean-react && next dev --experimental-https
scripts.dev-crossdomain: pnpm run link-posthog-js && pnpm run clean-react && NEXT_PUBLIC_CROSSDOMAIN=1 next dev --experimental-https
scripts.build: pnpm run build-posthog-js && pnpm run link-posthog-js && pnpm run clean-react && next build
scripts.build-posthog-js: cd ../../ && NODE_ENV=dev pnpm i && pnpm run build
scripts.link-posthog-js: cd ../../ && pnpm link --global && cd playground/nextjs && pnpm link --global posthog-js
